title: Metta Sandiford-Artest | Ep 54 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode
itunes:title: Metta Sandiford-Artest | Ep 54 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode
description:
On episode 54 of All The Smoke, Metta Sandiford-Artest joins Matt and Stak to talk about his roller coaster NBA career, including sharing stories of playing with Kobe and the Lakers, winning the 2009 title, and remembering the Malice and the Palace. The boys also talk about Artest's documentary QUIET STORM, growing up in Queens, and share some Knick's stories
